text:
OF the...in my defense, I am Russian.

name: thesoulbear
text: Look at the strip, then click "next" without taking your eyes off of it. The effect quite surprised me.

name: deusoma
text: Dude! That was awesome! Have a chubby, on the house.

name: hikikomori
text: Avatar-comment combo of an age

text: SO STAND ON IT, AGNES!

text: ALT TEXT: STAND ON IT AGNES

name: dovey
text: Strip Title: "Stand On it Agnes"

text: bicep tattoo:  stand on it agnes

name: semiquaver
text: Mother's name: Agnes

name: wulvaine
text: Agnes is standing on it.

name: semiquaver
text: Subject of Achewoodian one-liner: "Stand on it Agnes"

name: bixschmix
text: Now, let me get this straight...

name: semiquaver
text:
Reason bixschmix is bent: "Stand on it Agnes"

Oh fuck

name: dracer2
text: Richard Nixon: "Stand on it, Agnew"

name: m3funkyb
text: first strip i ever read

name: tetrisattack
text: SCREEEEEEEEEE!

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
i'll give you a chubby for your onomatopoeia.

awesome.

name: cdl146
text: C'mon, you ain't drivin'! Put yo' foot in tha tank!

name: evolume
text: I'm reminded of Grindhouse: Death Proof, which wouldn't have been released for almost 5 more years...

name: zedpower
text: Beef was certain they were going to be arrested. He just hoped it wouldn't be so soon.

name: johnnygeo
text: why 425 horsepower?  Previously Beef says it has the cammer 427, with 657 BHP.

name: selbencoirlo
text: ray is not a cat like beef who appreciates the finer points of such like geometry and machine languages and numbers over one hundred. he rounds everything off to the nearest five and doesn't even know he does it. it is seriously not a thing, it never even comes up.

name: solobuttons
text: we already arrested

name: hendetta
text: Cold sit on it ho.

name: lux
text: Agnes ain't no ho. She stands like a lady.

name: samodrei
text: it looks like he is shaking maracas.

name: deliciousmuffin
text: I wouldn't have even noticed if I didn't read your comment. Dangit, now everytime I look at this  I'm just gonna hear maracas in my head. And maybe Ray going "ARRRRIBA!"

name: stuart
text: Banned in six states

name: riazm
text:
Yesterday, in the car, I said to my Mother.

"SO STAND ON IT, AGNES."

She laughed, she understood.

name: jesler729
text: That is fantastic.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: lawl. that's great

name: molesticide
text:
i very immediately disapprove of spelling an acronym phonetically.

lawl. fuck you, man. fuck you, lawl.

FUCK the INTERNET

name: cpnglxynchos
text: i confess, it is a sketchy arena of netiquette that i dabble in.

name: semiquaver
text: Dude he added a southern drawl.  How Achewood is that.  It is taking the INTERNET by the EARS and shaking it until the cool thing to type into it falls out.

name: snowman
text: See, now, cause I really liked it...

name: cailetshadow
text: This was the first Achewood line I ever used in real life. I worked it pretty naturally into the conversation, too. She laughed so hard, she swerved onto the wrong side of the road (California One, not a good thing). She laughed so long I started to get a little upset at how much funnier Chris Onstad is than me.

name: charchar
text: telescoping limbs?

name: highpitch_83
text: Agnes has become my go-to phrase for calling out my best compadres lack of balls :)

name: a-halter
text: The start of the greatest story arc in Achewood history (in my opinion, which is of no use to you, as I am but a simple beet farmer).

name: semiquaver
text: Can you get Coke to start using some of your product instead of the interminable nasty corn?

name: farqussus
text:
I can't believe Coke is fucked in its home country. High fructose corn syrup is a terrifying entity.

What is wrong with sugar?

name: semiquaver
text: It's a complete fricking mystery to me.

name: aki
text: Luckily there are some places (such as a few authentic Mexican eateries) that carry the cane sugar variant...the problem lies in govt. subsidies and big corn (and ethanol production, by proxy)...alas, these things are of the daily fare for this Nebraskan to worry about :(

name: mypoorhands
text: Even Beef's all-caps battle cry doesn't go beyond the tiny, timid font.  That's the kind of emotional detail most popular programming simply fails to consider.

name: hellame
text: Stand on it, Agnes is my favourite thing to say to people when I'm trying not to say MOVE YOUR ASS ALREADY.  I love that line.

name: troy_convers
text: Someone should give them a notice that their car is frikkin' awesome.

name: oesse
text:
It warms my heart whenever Beef laughs.

Just all DRIP.

name: zapatos
text: You aren't arrested if they can't get the cuffs on you.

name: captain_arlo
text: Right at panel 5 a siren went by my house!  I looked out the window, but I couldn't see Ray and Beef.  Oh, well.

name: mustakrakesh
text: This is one of my favorite arcs, culminating in the curb-side rap.

name: zapatos
text: They should have brought Phillipe, he is good at standing on it.

name: puguglypress
text: "UN-LEASH!" would be the BOMB t-shirt.
